backend.models.interfaces package

Submodules

backend.models.interfaces.hugging_face_model_summarization module

Hugging Face Model Summary

This module extends the ModelSummary interface to load Hugging Face models.

class backend.models.interfaces.hugging_face_model_summarization.HuggingFaceModelSummarization(model_name, max_length, model_max_length, truncation, model_info, verbose=True)[source]

Bases: ModelSummarization

A Superclass used to build HuggingFace models for summarization

_info

A dictionnary containing the name, class name, description, paper link and GitHub repo link of the model

Type

dictionnary

_max_length

The maximum length parameter of the model

Type

int

_truncation

Whether or not to truncate input sequences

Type

boolean

_model

A HuggingFace model for summarization

Type

AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM

_tokenizer

A HuggingFace tokenizer

Type

AutoTokenizer

_pipe

A HuggingFace pipeline for summarization

Type

SummarizationPipeline

_summarize_dataset(self, dataset, column):

Summarizes a dataset and appends to it a column with the summarized text.

_summarize_text(self, text_to_summarize):

Summarizes a piece of text and returns it.

_summarize_dataset(dataset)[source]

Method that takes in a HuggingFace dataset and the name of the column of the dataset that contains the text to summarize. It calls the summarization pipeline attribute and runs it on the whole dataset. It saves the results in a list and adds this list to the dataset object and returns it.

Parameters

  • dataset (a HuggingFace dataset object) – The HuggingFace dataset to summarize

  • column (str) – The name of the column ofthe dataset with the text to summarize

Returns

dataset – The HuggingFace dataset to summarize with the summarized text column

Return type

a HuggingFace dataset object

_summarize_text(text_to_summarize)[source]

Method that takes in a piece of text and summarizes it by calling the tokenizer and model attributes and finally returns it.

Parameters

text_to_summarize (str) – The piece of text to summarize

Returns

summary_text – The summarized text as a list of strings

Return type

List of str
